com.ooyala.android.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.ooyala.android.player.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlayerInterface, LifeCycleInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MoviePlayer, StreamPlayer

    public class Player
extends java.util.Observable
implements PlayerInterface, LifeCycleInterface
    The interface that must be implemented in order to plug into OoyalaPlayer and Ooyala UI
